_comments.1: Browser names and OSs are based on the https://github.com/lancedikson/bowser library
_comments.2: Bowser library does not have a '>=' operator on version checking, so to indicate 'ie 11' or greater, specify >10.99
_comments.3: Version numbers must be begin with '>'
_comments.4: This > and version-0.01 conversion should be done in BrowserCheck.tsx to keep this file reusable to test .babelrc
_comments.5: The browser versions in validBrowsers MUST match browser targets in .babelrc file in the root directory
